text.0: from out the earth i dig this plant a herb of most effectual power.
text.1: wherewith one quells the rival wife and gains the husband for oneself.
text.2: auspicious with expanded leaves sent by the gods victorious plant.
text.3: blow thou the rival wife away and make my husband only mine.
text.4: stronger am  o stronger one yea mightier than the mightier.
text.5: and she who is my rival wife is lower than the lowest dames.
text.6: her very name i utter not she takes no pleasure in this man.
text.7: far into distance most remote drive we the rival wife away.
text.8: i am the conqueror and thou thou also act victorious.
text.9: as victory attends us both we will subdue my fellowwife.
text.10: i have gained thee for vanquisher have grasped thee with a stronger spell.
text.11: as a cow hastens to her calf so let thy spirit speed te me hasten like water on its way.
